response.overview: Darwin said it best. Tucked away in his Origin of Species, one of the most influential books of the last 200 years, is a warning to future generations: "If [X happens], my theory would absolutely break down."  In the last 50 years, X has happened. Not just once - thousands of times.  Dr. Ott's engaging 54-minute presentation breaks down advanced concepts of molecular biology and information science for all ages, and challenges us to answer a fundamental question: where did we come from?
response.tagline: Does the study of nature reveal the fingerprints of God?
response.title: Evidence for Design
